message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the sampling and reconstruction of operators, which is a topic related to signal processing and information theory. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SP (Signal Processing) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves the use of reconstruction formulas and geometric conditions, which are related to numerical analysis (cs.NA) and computational geometry (cs.CG). Additionally, the paper mentions the application of bandlimited operators in communication channels, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG).
